plot: DAGAM: Data Augmentation with Generation And Modification
summary: In pre-trained language models, under-fitting often occurs due to the size of the model being very large compared to the amount of available training data. In light of this, they introduce three data augmentation schemes that help reduce underfitting problems of large-scale language models. Data Augmentation with Generation And Modification (DAGAM) combines DAG and DAM techniques for a boosted performance. They conduct data augmentmentation for six benchmark datasets of text classification task, and verify the usefulness of DAG, DAM, and DAGAM through fine-tuning and evaluation.
